mapper.select:
select id, SEI, MEI, SEI_KANA, MEI_KANA, zip1, zip2, address_prefecture, address_city, address_ooaza, address_aza, address_other, tel1, tel2, tel3, mobile_tel1, mobile_tel2, mobile_tel3, email, setai_family, setai_count, setai_status, setai_year, setai_loan, income, savings, employment_status, company_name, company_zip1, company_zip2, company_address_prefecture, company_address_city, company_address_ooaza, company_address_aza, company_address_other, company_tel1, company_tel2, company_tel3, company_department, company_industry_type, company_work_years, apl_status, apl_comment, update_date from m_customer_apl
order by SEI_KANA, MEI_KANA

select id, SEI, MEI, SEI_KANA, MEI_KANA, zip1, zip2, address_prefecture, address_city, address_ooaza, address_aza, address_other, tel1, tel2, tel3, mobile_tel1, mobile_tel2, mobile_tel3, email, setai_family, setai_count, setai_status, setai_year, setai_loan, income, savings, employment_status, company_name, company_zip1, company_zip2, company_address_prefecture, company_address_city, company_address_ooaza, company_address_aza, company_address_other, company_tel1, company_tel2, company_tel3, company_department, company_industry_type, company_work_years, apl_status, apl_comment, update_date from m_customer_apl where id = #{id} and del_flg = '0'

select id, SEI, MEI, SEI_KANA, MEI_KANA, zip1, zip2, address_prefecture, address_city, address_ooaza, address_aza, address_other, tel1, tel2, tel3, mobile_tel1, mobile_tel2, mobile_tel3, email, setai_family, setai_count, setai_status, setai_year, setai_loan, income, savings, employment_status, company_name, company_zip1, company_zip2, company_address_prefecture, company_address_city, company_address_ooaza, company_address_aza, company_address_other, company_tel1, company_tel2, company_tel3, company_department, company_industry_type, company_work_years, apl_status, apl_comment, update_date from m_customer_apl where id = #{id} and del_flg = '0' for update
mapper.insert:
insert into m_customer_apl( id, SEI, MEI, SEI_KANA, MEI_KANA, zip1, zip2, address_prefecture, address_city, address_ooaza,
address_aza,
address_other,
tel1, tel2, tel3,
mobile_tel1,
mobile_tel2,
mobile_tel3,
email, setai_family, setai_count, setai_status, setai_year, setai_loan, income, savings, employment_status, company_name, company_zip1, company_zip2, company_address_prefecture, company_address_city, company_address_ooaza,
company_address_aza,
company_address_other,
company_tel1, company_tel2, company_tel3, company_department, company_industry_type, company_work_years, apl_status, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user ) values( #{id}, #{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{lastnameKana}, #{firstnameKana}, #{zip1}, #{zip2}, #{addressPrefecture}, #{addressCity}, #{addressOoaza},
#{addressAza},
#{addressOther},
#{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3},
#{mobileTel1},
#{mobileTel2},
#{mobileTel3},

#{companyAddressAza},
#{companyAddressOther},
#{companyTel1}, #{companyTel2}, #{companyTel3}, #{companyDepartment}, #{companyIndustryType}, #{companyWorkYears}, #{applicationStatus}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser} )
